vulkanmod.options.advCulling.tooltip: Use a culling algorithm that might improve performance by reducing the number of non visible chunk sections rendered.
vulkanmod.options.ao.subBlock.tooltip: ON (Sub-block): Enables smooth lighting for non full block (experimental).
vulkanmod.options.entityCulling.tooltip: Enables culling for entities on not visible sections.
vulkanmod.options.frameQueue.tooltip: Higher values might help stabilize frametime but will increase input lag.
vulkanmod.options.indirectDraw.tooltip: Reduces CPU overhead but increases GPU overhead. Enabling it might help in CPU limited systems.
vulkanmod.options.uniqueOpaqueLayer.tool: Use a unique render layer for opaque terrain to improve performance.
vulkanmod.options.swapchainImages.toolti: The number of images in the swap chain. Depending on the device, the frame rate may increase/decrease or have no effect at all.
vulkanmod.options.animations.tooltip: Makes the animated textures to animate. Disabling this prevents them from animating and may improve performance a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderSky.tooltip: Renders the sky, giving small performance boost but it also makes debug lines doesn't render with MiniHUD, and Litematica mod.
vulkanmod.options.entityOutline.tooltip: Renders White Outline if an entity affected by Glowing potion effect. Giving performance boost in some scenarios once disabled especially in servers with many entities affected with Glowing Effect.
vulkanmod.options.showPojav.tooltip: Shows Pojav information on the F3 debug screen.
vulkanmod.options.cameraOopts.tooltip: Greatly optimizes camera performance but causes weird chunk delay when moving backwards.
vulkanmod.options.showDeviceRAMInfo.tool: For Debugging purposes, shows your Device RAM Info on debug screen.
vulkanmod.options.deviceRAMInfoUpdateDel: Sets the number of seconds when the RAM info updates information. Setting too low can affect performance.
vulkanmod.options.resetHighUsageRec.tool: Enable to reset highest memory and RAM usage records every 45 seconds.
vulkanmod.options.showQueueFamily.toolti: Shows queue families info on F3 debug screen.
